title: Fragrant Thai style chicken soup
ingredients: ['1.5L fish stock', '600g boneless skinless chicken thighs, cubed', '2 dessertspoons fish sauce', '1 (10cm piece) ginger, peeled and finely grated', '2 lemongrass stalks, finely chopped', '1 large garlic clove, finely chopped', '1 dessertspoon soya sauce', 'zest of 1 lime', '3 green finger chillies with seeds, finely chopped', '4 spring onions, roughly chopped', '250g mushrooms, roughly sliced', '250g baby tomatoes, halved', '1 bunch pak choi, roughly chopped', '1 (400ml) tin coconut milk', 'juice of 1 lime', '1 handful fresh coriander']
